document_data.mainbody:
rlho was a brewer and merchant inhabiting the town of Ashabenford in Mistledale during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Arlho owned a brewery and winery called Arlhos Fine Flasks located in the center of Ashabenford. Though the quality of his wares would easily allow him to expand his business to earn more income, Arlho preferred to keep things small and manageable.
Arlho was originally from Arabel.
